SEARCH
Package Control

Class ReportControl

java.lang.Object
Control.ReportControl
public class ReportControl extends Object
Controls report generation and management for career center staff. Generates comprehensive reports on internship opportunities with various filters including status, major, level, company, and date ranges. Reports can be saved to CSV files for documentation and analysis.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Allen
